extracted_playbook.title: Update JT2Go
extracted_playbook.description: Update JT2Go to version V2406.0003 or later to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Untrusted PDF Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not open untrusted PDF files in affected applications to reduce risk.

extracted_playbook.title: Remove PDFJTExtractor.exe
extracted_playbook.description: Remove the PDFJTExtractor.exe from the installation in the affected application to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Protect network access to devices with appropriate mechanisms and configure the environment according to Siemens' operational guidelines for industrial security.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewalls and Isolation
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Remote Access
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use secure methods such as VPNs, ensuring they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
